title: Test in minimal-nuxt-ui-app
description:
Test the upgraded module in the test project before publishing.

Steps:
1. Update test-projects/minimal-nuxt-ui-app to Nuxt 4 + UI 4
2. Link local module: pnpm link ../..
3. Start the app: pnpm run dev
4. Use /agent-browser skill to test all flows:
   - Sign up with team
   - Sign in
   - Profile management
   - Team management
   - Password reset
   - OAuth flows (if configured)

Agent-browser will automate browser testing and provide screenshots for verification.

Test: All flows verified using agent-browser in consumer app
acceptance_criteria: Module works correctly in test consumer app (verified via agent-browser)
